DSC stands for the Developer Student Clubs. We are a team that excels in raising and transmitting technical and leadership skills in students. The GDSC program is a mainstream channel through which Google providers development skills. We train our students to learn development skills, and solve technical problems through technology. We collaborate with different institutions with contribution of faculty members also taken into heed.
DSC trains in domains like Web and Application Development, Machine learning and Artificial  Intelligence, Cloud Computing, Design, and Competitive Programming.
DSC conducts various sessions including Google Solution Challenge, Hands-on Workshops, Expert Tech Talks, Study Jams, Bootcamps, Explore ML, Roadmap Sessions, and Tech Programs.

DSC conducts multifarious events throughout the year. Some recent events include Android Study Jams, 30 Days GCP, Hacktober Fest, Google Solution Challenge, and DSC WOW Hackathon. To know more about upcoming events, connect with us anywhere website: https://gdsc.community.dev/sies-graduate-school-of-technology-navi-mumbai/ , Discord: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTDiscord , Instagram: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTInstagram , YouTube: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTYouTube, LinkedIn: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTLinkedIn, Twitter: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTTwitter
DSC Core Teams include the Web and App Development Team, the ML & AI Team, the Design Team, the Social Media and Publicity Team, and the Administration and Management Team.

Reach us here, website: https://gdsc.community.dev/sies-graduate-school-of-technology-navi-mumbai/ , Discord: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTDiscord , Instagram: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTInstagram , YouTube: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTYouTube, LinkedIn: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTLinkedIn, Twitter: https://bit.ly/GDSCSIESGSTTwitter
DSC welcomes university students (undergraduate or post-graduate) who are enthusiastic to learn development skills, passionate about solving problems with technology, inspired to become changemakers.
Absolutely! It’s OK to join even if you are not from SIES GST, as long as you don’t wreak havoc here. Crash into our Discord server while you’re at it.
Ofcourse, It's okay to join even if you are not from Computer Science background, as long as you have the passion for building a better tomorrow with technology.
Become part of our community to access Google Developer resources and opportunities for free, and also help grow your personal and professional network.

The core team is a group of contributing members who are responsible for GSDC SIES GST's operations, including the planning and execution of activities and events.We take interviews for the core team on annual basis.

patterns: What unique skills can we obtain
responses: The DSC clubs are intended as a space for students to try out new ideas and collaborate to solve mobile and web development problems.
Developer Students Club opts to shape student developers for a better future by teaching them various technical as well as non-technical skills
The head of core team mentors the projects.

The core team is a group of contributing members who are responsible for GSDC SIES GST's operations, including the planning and execution of activities and events.We take interviews for the core team on annual basis.

patterns: what do i get after completing term with dsc
do i get anything on completing term
responses: Upon completing the term, a certificate will be given to you along with some great learning experiences!

patterns: do i have to join only one team
can i be in one domain only
responses: Yes, you can join multiple domains.

patterns: what is needed to join dsc
responses: A person must possess leadership qualities, team coordination and, most importantly, a thirst for learning and exploration.

The project depends on the team which you are part of.These are the projects/challenges you will work on when you become the part of DSC team -Google Solution Challenge,Hands-on Workshops,Bootcamps,Study Jams,Expert Tech Talks,Tech Programs,Explore ML,Roadmap Sessions.

patterns: what is 30 days of google cloud
when is 30 days of google cloud
what do i get from 30 days of google cloud
how to participate in 30 days of google cloud
what are rewards from 30 days of google cloud
responses: Google Cloud in collaboration with Developer Students Club (DSC) provides an opportunity to students to start their journey in cloud programming with hands-on labs on Google Cloud Platform that powers apps like Google Search, Gmail, and YouTube. Along the way, you will learn and practice cloud concepts like computing, big data, application developments, and machine learning. It usually takes place in October every year.

patterns: what do i get from android study jams
how long are android study jams
how to participate in android study jams
what are rewards from android study jams
responses: Android Study Jams are community events where developers come together to learn, create, and collaborate. Participants will follow guided codelabs designed to improve their development skills, all with an extra focus on improving the quality of applications.

patterns: how many levels in explore ml
what do i get from explore ml
how to participate in explore ml
what are rewards from explore ml
responses: Explore Machine Learning (ML) is a Google-sponsored program for university students to get started with Machine Learning.Explore ML is a 2-day training experience for student facilitators to get familiar with the programs’ content, meet one another and connect to Googlers.

patterns: what do i get from devfest
responses: DevFest India is the largest annual developer’s fest organized by Google Developer Groups across India.It is an 3 days event packed with learning, networking, experimenting and swags for few winners!
